name: Basketball Players Showdown a Real Jam Shots 2K17
name_original: Basketball Players Showdown a Real Jam Shots 2K17
description:
Have fun with Basketball Player! It's an addictive game designed for basketball fans.
Do you like basketball? You can show off your basketball skills!

HOW TO PLAY 
The game features simple touch and drag controls and realistic physics. 
Tap and drag anywhere on the line to change the power and angle of your shot and release to shoot. 
Score the maximum number of points within the 60 seconds allowed. 

SKILLS 
Earn more money than you can in order to purchase skills! 
- Three Balls: Throw three balls together for 15 sec. 
- Magnet: The ball is attracted to the basket for 15 sec. 
- Full Line: Full trajectory line for 20 sec. 

ADDITIONAL FEATURES 
- Gamecenter support 
- Compete with friends via leaderboard rankings 
- Shoot as many basketballs as you can to earn points and coins 
- Drag finger to aim basketball and make a basketball shot 
- Release finger to take a basketball shot at basketball hoop 
- Enjoy making basketball shots 
- Score the maximum number of points within the 60 seconds allowed 
- Time limit 
- Intuitive touch-screen controls! 
- A fun basketball game! 
- You can play your favorite game in any place at any time! 
- Stats: total score, throws attempted and made, total accuracy, accuracy chart. Like a Pro Player!!! 

LEADERBOARDS 
- Time Limit 

ACHIEVEMENTS 
Over 15 achievement: 
- 3, 5, 10 and 15 throws in row 
- Beginner, Expert, Pro and Perfect Accuracy 
- Beginner, Expert and Pro points in a game 
- Beginner, Average and Pro player 
- Skills Shopper
